title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 13, 2020
description: It's the birthday of music critic Lester Bangs (1948-1982), who wrote, "The ultimate sin of any performer is contempt for the audience."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of music critic Lester Bangs (1948-1982), who wrote, "The ultimate sin of any performer is contempt for the audience."
